message: Hi Bob, I have a product I think you might be interested in.  I'm asking $150 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down to $135,  but I'm not sure I can go any lower.  What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $125?
